WRITING.TEXT: Standing by for eating of the hat. ;)

This is pretty much how it was handled. The squadmates didn't recognize the odd situation for what it was worth and just ignored it. Figured I would let other people get mental reps of the situation when it presents itself in the future.
This would have been a proper response. I'm laughing just thinking about watching him jump.
Duct tape on my windows tactical.
All of our cars have a 3A panel in each door. We do high risk stops about every week so I think it's a needed protection just in case bad guy jumps out firing off rounds.
Criminal intent is a thing you know... If a cop went to a place he was not supposed to be it would be trespassing too.
If you pay for an alarm service you sign a contract allowing police to check your residence for forced entry.

My first couple weeks as a police officer I responded to a medical unconcious call in my beat. Call comments stated boyfriend woke up next to his fiance and she was cold. I was first on scene and the image of relief the young kid had on his face is unforgetable as I rushed into his house to adminster CPR while my trainer took him outside. Fire department came 5 minutes after to take over life saving efforts. The other face that is unforgetable was when I told him his 24 year old fiance passed away while she slept. Being a cop is hard sometimes.

WRITING.TITLE: Looking for running buddy/group for Pats run tomorrow
WRITING.TEXT: Any other solo runners want to team up and run Pat's run in Tempe, AZ tomorrow? Shooting for a 10 minute pace.

I don't have experience with any of the watches but I would consider myself a watch enthusiast. The watch I went with for excersize/work it the Fitbit Surge. It does pretty much everything all those watches do and is around the same price point. I had the last generation of the moto 360 and the problem was charging it every night. With the fitbit surge I plug in every 5 days or so and in an hour it's fully charged. Just my .02

Bodies are easy if you can dehumanize it. It's easy to roll a dead body or see someone's head blown off until the family rolls on scene and freaks out. Seeing a guy blow his brains with a 12 gauge wasn't as bad as seeing an 80 year old woman kissing her newly deceased husband as the medical examiner rolls him out of the room. We've all been there man just smile like it's all good.

I responded to a call of a maid finding a person who had shot himself. We get on scene and theres a trail of blood leading from the living room with swiped hand marks from someone trying to crawl. We eventually find his body in a separate room with the right side of his head blown off. He had a pile of blood soaked clothes which looked like he tried to clean up his mess. Investigation discovered that he was in hundreds of thousands dollars of debt and decided to kill himself with a shotgun. He put the barrel in his mouth but as he pulled the trigger he flinched causing the barrel to more slightly to the right. He missed his brain and blew out the back right side of his head. Because the barrel was in his mouth the gases trying to escape blew out his eyes. He crawled around his house fully functional trying to clean up his mess without being able to see. While bleeding out. It was horrific and I wouldn't recommend anyone seeing it.
Straight misdemeanors there friend. Probably get 15 days jail and $600 in fines or something like that if the judge wants to make an example out of them.

Got a call about a maid finding her client dead in his room from an apparent gun shot wound. We get there and found him laying in a pool of blood with a shotgun across the room from him. When the gas of a shotgun is trying to escape your mouth it goes out any orface it can. His eyes exploded from the sockets and there were several pools of blood/hand prints around the room. There was also a white towell covered in blood across from him. Investigation revealed that he put the shotgun in his mouth and pulled the trigger. He flinched last second blowing one side of his head off. Blind and probably deaf he crawled around his room for maybe 30 seconds in agony. Looks like he even tried to clean it up with the towell. Shit gives me nightmares thinking about the terror this man was suffering in the last seconds of his life.
I just ordered one as well... Have you recieved yours yet?
You in US? Any problems with the watch?

I have personal experience responding to a house fire when rounds going off.. it sounds like firecrackers and the firefighters didn't think twice about it. The media was taking cover the next morning as they reported rounds going off in the smoldering ashes of the house. Pretty funny stuff actually.
Carry a loaded glock is about the equivilant isnt it? I'm pretty sure Sig passes the drop test preventing them from being fired if dropped from any reasonahle height.

WRITING.TITLE: Do I need to upgrade my processor?
WRITING.TEXT: Purchased a 1080TI but am worried about my processor performance. Is it worth the upgrade cost to get a new processor and a motherboard? Thanks! [PCPartPicker part list](https://pcpartpicker.com/list/6BNwf8) / [Price breakdown by merchant](https://pcpartpicker.com/list/6BNwf8/by_merchant/) Type|Item|Price :----|:----|:---- **CPU** | [Intel - Core i5-4690K 3.5GHz Quad-Core OEM/Tray Processor](https://pcpartpicker.com/product/BQ8Zxr/intel-cpu-cm8064601710803) |- **Motherboard** | [Gigabyte - GA-Z97N-WIFI Mini ITX LGA1150 Motherboard](https://pcpartpicker.com/product/8BsKHx/gigabyte-motherboard-gaz97nwifi) |- **Memory** | [G.Skill - Ripjaws X Series 8GB (2 x 4GB) DDR3-1600 Memory](https://pcpartpicker.com/product/LzTmP6/gskill-memory-f312800cl9d8gbxl) | $56.88 @ OutletPC **Storage** | [Western Digital - Caviar Blue 1TB 3.5" 7200RPM Internal Hard Drive](https://pcpartpicker.com/product/MwW9TW/western-digital-internal-hard-drive-wd10ezex) | $48.44 @ OutletPC **Video Card** | [Gigabyte - GeForce GTX 1080 Ti 11GB AORUS Video Card](https://pcpartpicker.com/product/cHFXsY/gigabyte-geforce-gtx-1080-ti-11gb-aorus-video-card-gv-n108taorus-11gd) | $708.99 @ SuperBiiz **Case** | [Cooler Master - Elite 130 Mini ITX Tower Case](https://pcpartpicker.com/product/6wR48d/cooler-master-case-rc130kkn1) | $39.89 @ OutletPC **Power Supply** | [EVGA - 600B 600W 80+ Bronze Certified ATX Power Supply](https://pcpartpicker.com/product/V9bp99/evga-power-supply-100b10600kr) | $39.89 @ OutletPC | *Prices include shipping, taxes, rebates, and discounts* | | Total (before mail-in rebates) | $909.09 | Mail-in rebates | -$15.00 | **Total** | **$894.09** | Generated by [PCPartPicker](http://pcpartpicker.com) 2017-06-06 06:43 EDT-0400 |
Should be noted that my build is a couple years old and I just upgraded the graphics card. Just want to make sure nothing is getting bottlenecked with my old components.
1440P is the plan
Do you noticed a drop in your benchmarks opposed to people running 7700k? Is it noticeable?
I guess I didn't put in my complete build. I do have a smaller SSD (120GB) in my current build. It's probably time for a size upgrade now that costs have gone down tho. Thanks!
So we're talking 10FPS boost for like $400? I guess it'll really come down to how it performs in my system.
Awesome thank you. I'll have to run some benchmarks to see exactly how much my processor is slowing everything down.
I sense some sarcasm here...
How much FPS is it slowing it down? Is it a real world difference?
You dropped this. \
Me usually :(

Gofish_yourself 297 titan
gofish_yourself titan 299

I guess it all depends on a money situation. At $3 an hour for first time content I'm okay with it. Don't get me wrong, if you like grinding the you can easily play for 60+ hours to complete things.

GOFISH_YOURSELF Titan 302

Local PD here... Generally, monitored security services are scams. Expect a ten minute response once activated activation is had and maybe a gt;1% chance of just an alarm system getting your stuff back. Cameras are your best option since a picture/video of bad guy swiping your stuff is fantastic evidence for identification. That picture will be shared with all local PDs and surely end up in a identified bad guy. Stay safe!
Any kind of Drug Paraphernalia. People who are getting their trash ran are people who are usually suspected of selling drugs. Not just users.

There's a video on YouTube that explains it. Different surfaces are different loudness for shoes or no shoes. There's trade offs for each. The main point for me was that sand is louder without shoes but buildings shoes are louder.
\ You dropped this.

Try multiplication to get your sensativity index. He plays with 400 DPI at 50 ADS sensativity. 400x50=20000. His ADS sensativity index is 20000. Now try to get a 20000 index with your 500 DPI. 20000/500= 40. So you want your ADS at 40. Just do that with all them. Once you've done the math and played like him for a lil you'll see that shroud isn't really a human and regardless of settings you won't be as good as him. Hope I helped!
There is max cap of 144.
I neeeeeed it.
I upgraded from a 4690k and got a solid 20 FPS bump. I'd say it was worth it.

110-144 depending on the area or effects. Maxed at 144 in an open field but it'll drop to 110 in big cities. Probably a 1% low of 90 if SHTF in game. Only thing I keep on low is V-Sync and shadows. Everything else is on Ultra.
I always took it as some high tech military training simulator.

Earlier in my life I had sudden cardiac arrest. I ended up being transported to the hospital and put in a hypothermic coma. The reason for the coma is that I was without oxygen for 6 minutes and they were worried I damaged my organs. I woke up 5 days after the incident but don't have any recollection until 10 days after. My experience with amnesia is non existant but my wife's is. She tells me for those five days I would wake up and have a conversation with her and be the same person I always was. We'd watch a movie and I'd fall asleep. However after waking up she would have to go through explaining what happened to me again and we'd watch the same move that I swore I had never seen. I guess it's a case by case thing and some people react to brain trauma. The doctors were sure that I was going to stay that away and scared my family to death.
Haven't had very many migrants. If they're not local most of the times it's girls that come from other states.

Sometimes motherboards deactivate m.2 drives when certain SATA ports are used. For example if I have a SSD in SATA 1 I can't have m.2 in the m.2 1 tray. TL;DR unplug your SATA cords and see if that works then plug your sata into another port.

PD here.. definitely report this. Amazon probably has the serial numbers too which if you provide to the PD can be tracked. You'd be surprised how many of your neighbors have security cameras that could track bad guy snagging your things.

Hemp contains a very low amount of THC but is high in CBD. CBD has healing properties and is used in people who want the healing effact but not the high effect. Marijuana/Cannabis is high in THC and gets your high af with a little amount of CBD.
